name: Don't Die (itch) (Jellicode)
description:
Don't Die is an arena battler where what you roll at the beginning of your game dictates how you play.

The game works best on a smaller screen, it is recommended to not use full-screen.

This is my first game jam game ever, and I pulled close to an all-nighter on this. Unfortunately I selected the wrong build / game file and could not change it in time; the resolution\canvas might be a bit skewed for certain displays. 

Either way, I hope you enjoy!
